onset.Description: true onset time of the event

duration.Description: true duration time of the event (approximated)

dsgn_onset.Description: The designed onset time of the event

dsgn_duration.Description: The designed duration time of the event

feedback.Description: transparency of 'FEEL', range [0,1], 0=100% transparent, 1=100% opaque, based on rt-predicted valence

avg_feedback.Description: three volume moving avg. of rt-predicted valence scaled to [-1,1]

threshold.Description: avg_feedback value needed to trigger stimulus, range [0,0.8]
